int decisionCount
 The number of decisions encountered during this visit.

Detailed Description

This visitor calculates the McCabe complexity of the RHS to which it is applied.

The McCabe complexity is simply a count of the number of decisions; thus the union and option operator, along with the two closure operations all represent a single decision.
